name: Grant Ghost Familiar
effect: The willworker is capable of forging a familiar bond between a ghost and another mage. By way of this magic, mages unskilled in the secrets of the Death Arcanum might gain ghostly familiars of their own. See the Ghost Familiar Pact spell. The subject pays the Merit cost. As above, the familiar bond may not be forced onto an unwilling ghost. Also as above, this spell may not be cast upon a mage who already possesses a familiar, ghostly or otherwise.

rotes.roteDescription: Through the use of this rote, willworkers occasionally bestow ghostly familiars upon friends, allies, and students.
